history.proof: intros d sigma H. unfold DTA_kill_empty_states_lazy. destruct d as [d0 a]. hauto lq: on depth: 3use: DTA_kill_empty_states_lazy_correct_wrt_sign_invar.

exceptions.exn: In environment d0 : preDTA a : ad sigma : signature H : predta_correct_wrt_sign d0 sigma Unable to unify "match DTA_kill_empty_states_lazy ?M1854 with | dta d _ => predta_correct_wrt_sign d ?M1855 end" with "match match MapGet state (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states_lazy d0) d0) a with | Some _ => dta (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states_lazy d0) d0) a | None => dta (M1 state 0%N (M0 prec_list)) 0%N end with | dta d _ => predta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma end".

In environment d0 : preDTA a : ad sigma : signature H : predta_correct_wrt_sign d0 sigma Unable to unify "predta_correct_wrt_sign d0 sigma" with "dta_correct_wrt_sign match MapGet state (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states_lazy d0) d0) a with | Some _ => dta (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states_lazy d0) d0) a | None => dta (M1 state 0%N (M0 prec_list)) 0%N end sigma".

original: intros d sigma H. unfold DTA_kill_empty_states_lazy. destruct d as [d0 a]. unfold dta_correct_wrt_sign in H. simpl in *. apply DTA_kill_empty_states_lazy_correct_wrt_sign_invar. apply H.
